createcertificateauthority.name: CreateCertificateAuthority
createcertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to create an AWS Private CA and its associated private key and configuration

createcertificateauthorityauditreport.name: CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
createcertificateauthorityauditreport.description: Grants permission to create an audit report for an AWS Private CA

createpermission.name: CreatePermission
createpermission.description: Grants permission to create a permission for an AWS Private CA

deletecertificateauthority.name: DeleteCertificateAuthority
deletecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS Private CA and its associated private key and configuration

deletepermission.name: DeletePermission
deletepermission.description: Grants permission to delete a permission for an AWS Private CA

deletepolicy.name: DeletePolicy
deletepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the policy for an AWS Private CA

describecertificateauthority.name: DescribeCertificateAuthority
describecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to return a list of the configuration and status fields contained in the specified AWS Private CA

describecertificateauthorityauditreport.name: DescribeCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
describecertificateauthorityauditreport.description: Grants permission to return the status and information about an AWS Private CA audit report

getcertificate.name: GetCertificate
getcertificate.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN

getcertificateauthoritycertificate.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCertificate
getcertificateauthoritycertificate.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN

getcertificateauthoritycsr.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCsr
getcertificateauthoritycsr.description: Grants permission to retrieve an AWS Private CA certificate signing request (CSR) for the certificate-authority specified by an ARN

getpolicy.name: GetPolicy
getpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the policy on an AWS Private CA

importcertificateauthoritycertificate.name: ImportCertificateAuthorityCertificate
importcertificateauthoritycertificate.description: Grants permission to import an SSL/TLS certificate into AWS Private CA for use as the CA certificate of an AWS Private CA

issuecertificate.name: IssueCertificate
issuecertificate.description: Grants permission to issue an AWS Private CA certificate

listcertificateauthorities.name: ListCertificateAuthorities
listcertificateauthorities.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of the AWS Private CA certificate authority ARNs, and a summary of the status of each CA in the calling account

listpermissions.name: ListPermissions
listpermissions.description: Grants permission to list the permissions that have been applied to the AWS Private CA certificate authority

listtags.name: ListTags
listtags.description: Grants permission to list the tags that have been applied to the AWS Private CA certificate authority

putpolicy.name: PutPolicy
putpolicy.description: Grants permission to put a policy on an AWS Private CA

restorecertificateauthority.name: RestoreCertificateAuthority
restorecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to restore an AWS Private CA from the deleted state to the state it was in when deleted

revokecertificate.name: RevokeCertificate
revokecertificate.description: Grants permission to revoke a certificate issued by an AWS Private CA

tagcertificateauthority.name: TagCertificateAuthority
tagcertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to an AWS Private CA

untagcertificateauthority.name: UntagCertificateAuthority
untagcertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from an AWS Private CA

updatecertificateauthority.name: UpdateCertificateAuthority
updatecertificateauthority.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of an AWS Private CA
